summary: This is an FBI email from August 9, 2019, containing operational planning documents for an investigation related to Jeffrey Epstein, focusing on his private island. The attachments suggest plans for travel and securing the location, indicating active law enforcement preparation.

events.title: FBI Operational Planning for Epstein Island
events.description: FBI email transmitting operational planning documents for an investigation targeting Jeffrey Epstein's private island, including travel and securing plans.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively planning an operation related to Jeffrey Epstein's private island as of August 9, 2019.
The planning involved specific documents for operational travel and securing the island location.
The email originated from the FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad, indicating the nature of the investigation.
The document shows law enforcement was in advanced stages of planning an island operation shortly before Epstein's death.
